Description: Red pottery ostracon, fabric has a grey section, two fragments joined, from the body of a vessel, interior grooved, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip, with traces of black-painted hieratic text on both sides.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393092) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393092)
Condition: fair (text faded and worn in places)
